Package IRPact_modellierung.decision

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsumerAgentAdoptionDecisionProcess
    Abstraction to represent an adoption decision process executed by a ConsumerAgent.
    DecisionConfiguration
    Data structure to bundle the decision processes.
    DecisionMakingProcess
    Abstraction to represent a decision making process.
    DeliberativeConsumerAgentAdoptionDecisionProcess
    Decision process that models consumer agent adoption based on 'Deliberative Decision' after Schwarz.
    KieslingUtilitarianConsumerAgentAdoptionDecisionProcess
    Decision process that models consumer agent product adoption as described in Kiesling.
    LinearPreferenceOrientedUtilityFunction
    Utility function that calculates the utility of a product attribute as the sum of partial utilities of the preferences (contributing to it).
    LinearUtilityFunction
    The linear utility function is a function that attributes the perception of a product attribute to the actor.
    SchwarzTakeTheBestHeuristicUtilitarianConsumerAgentAdoptionDecisionProcess
    Decision process based on the model described in Schwarz.
    TakeTheBestHeuristicUtilitarianConsumerAgentAdoptionDecisionProcess  
    UtilitarianConsumerAgentAdoptionDecisionProcess  
    UtilityFunction
    An abstraction of a utility function to calculate the (partial) utility of a product attribute for a consumer agent at a given time.
